vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Εὔα (WH, Εὔα, § 408; Rec. Εὖα; S (in I Ti), Εὖα), -ας, ἡ (Heb. חַוָּה, Gen.3:20),
Eve, wife of Adam: 2Co.11:3, 1Ti.2:13.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.3.20;
married to Adam (H0121);
mother of: Cain (H7014B), Abel (H1893) and Seth (H8352)
§ Eve, "life"
Eve, (Proper name), 2Cor. 11:3; 1Tim. 2:13*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
夏娃 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "生命"
聖經所記載的第一個女人, 全人類的母親 (林後 11:3; 提前 2:13)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
夏娃 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "生命"
圣经所记载的第一个女人, 全人类的母亲 (林后 11:3; 提前 2:13)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Ê-va « người sống » ; người phụ nữ đầu tiên trong kinh thánh // H2332
